intro.heading: These are the apps you're looking for.
typewriter_lines: Shipping mobile, one clean merge at a time.
May the source be with you.
These are the builds you're looking for.
Live long and refactor.
Boldly shipping where no app has shipped before.
One does not simply ship on Friday.
So we let CI decide.
Winter is coming. So are edge cases.
Good thing tests travel in packs.
Houston, we have a merge conflict.
Resolving at T-minus deploy.
The app awakens.
SwiftUI strikes back.
Keep calm and let Xcode index.
I ship when the spinner stops.
There is no place like 127.0.0.1.
Until QA says otherwise.
In Swift we trust.
In CI we verify.
With great power comes great merge responsibility.
And fewer force unwraps.
intro.description:
I'm an Engineering Manager at Roole, responsible for mobile engineering across Roole Map and Roole Premium. My focus is aligning product strategy, technical architecture, and execution so teams can deliver high-quality outcomes at a sustainable pace.
I work at the intersection of engineering, product, and platform concerns: roadmap planning, cross-team coordination, API and tooling evaluation, and continuous improvement of architecture and CI/CD practices.

timeline.title: Engineering Manager
timeline.subtitle: Roole
timeline.description:
Leads mobile engineering for Roole Map and Roole Premium.
Coordinates teams and Tech Leads around roadmap, priorities, and delivery quality.
Aligns product strategy, backend dependencies, and platform-level objectives.

timeline.title: Tech Lead Mobile
timeline.subtitle: Roole
timeline.description:
Led technical design and delivery for Roole Map.
Drove architecture evolution, including migration toward MVVM with SwiftUI.
Established stronger engineering practices across iOS and Android collaboration.

timeline.title: Chief Digital Officer
timeline.subtitle: Vialife
timeline.description:
Owned technical direction for Vialife Digital's platform and products.
Coordinated engineering and business execution for publisher-facing digital services.
Supported API strategy, product evolution, and delivery scalability.

timeline.title: Mobile Project Manager
timeline.subtitle: Vialife
timeline.description:
Managed and delivered mobile projects across multiple platforms.
Led technical decisions across iOS and Android applications.
Contributed hands-on to backend APIs, R&D initiatives, and app publication workflows.

timeline.title: iOS Developer, Project Manager
timeline.subtitle: Things Are Moving
timeline.description:
Designed and shipped native Apple platform applications.
Covered product design, development, integration, testing, and App Store release.
Worked with Core Data, Core Location, Core Animation, In-App Purchases, and GameKit.

timeline.title: .NET Developer (Intern)
timeline.subtitle: Air Liquide
timeline.description:
Contributed to .NET application development in an enterprise environment.
Supported implementation and maintenance of internal software components.

timeline.title: Symfony Developer (Intern)
timeline.subtitle: Superprof
timeline.description:
Worked on Symfony-based web development tasks and backend features.
Contributed to implementation quality and product iteration speed.

skills.heading: Skills
skills.description: I combine hands-on mobile engineering depth with leadership across roadmap, architecture, and delivery. The objective is simple: make teams faster, systems clearer, and releases more predictable.

projects.heading: Project Highlights
projects.description: Selected products and initiatives across mobility and digital publishing.
typewriter_lines: Why did the iOS app break up with production?
It said: this relationship needs more test coverage.
I told Xcode a joke about memory leaks.
It did not retain it.
Why do engineers avoid shipping on Friday?
Because bugs love weekend road trips.
How many developers does it take to fix a race condition?
Depends on who gets there first.
Why did the feature ask for a rollback plan?
It had trust issues with hotfixes.

pro.heading: Roole Map
pro.cover_description: A free mobility app designed to simplify everyday driving across France.
pro.description:
Led technical strategy and delivery for the product's mobile foundations.
Drove architecture modernization and delivery practices across teams.
Supported roadmap execution with strong product-backend alignment.

pro.heading: Roole Premium
pro.cover_description: The mobile companion app for Roole members and premium services.
pro.description:
Coordinated mobile delivery alongside Roole Map under shared standards.
Improved cross-team planning and execution predictability.
Aligned technical and product roadmaps with platform objectives.

pro.heading: Vialife Digital
pro.cover_description: A multi-channel digital publishing platform for press publishers.
pro.description:
Helped shape and deliver APIs, mobile readers, and platform integrations.
Contributed to secure architecture, content distribution workflows, and long-term scalability.
Supported product and business objectives across digital channels.

pro.heading: Digital Press Applications Suite
pro.cover_description: A shared architecture powering multiple branded press distribution apps.
pro.description:
Led delivery of a suite of press apps with a common technical foundation.
Balanced reusable architecture with product-specific customizations.
Owned project coordination, iOS implementation, and release quality.

pro.heading: MyViapresse
pro.cover_description: A consumer mobile app for digital magazines and newspapers at scale.
pro.description:
Owned end-to-end product lifecycle across design, architecture, and delivery.
Migrated and modernized the app through multiple technical generations.
Implemented subscription models and offline reading at scale.

pro.heading: Dakar Press
pro.cover_description: A mobile app delivering Senegalese daily newspapers to a global audience.
pro.description:
Designed and built an iOS app for international digital press access.
Focused on quality reading UX, subscription flows, and offline capability.
Supported scalability for geographically distributed users.

pro.heading: Le Moniteur des Pharmacies
pro.cover_description: A professional iOS app for pharmacists combining news, training, and clinical references.
pro.description:
Built the native iOS app in Swift for pharmacists' daily workflows.
Delivered multi-format access across real-time news, digital magazines, jobs, and reference content.
Implemented a reliable mobile experience focused on practical tools and frequent professional use.

pro.heading: Le Point Veterinaire
pro.cover_description: A native iOS app for veterinarians with news, training, and practical decision tools.
pro.description:
Developed the native iOS app in Swift for veterinary professionals.
Integrated news, training content, publications, and practical data tools in one mobile product.
Focused on usability, regular usage patterns, and dependable information access.

hobby.heading: Loic Engineer Portfolio
hobby.cover_description: This portfolio website, built as a fast static project with data-driven content.
hobby.description:
Designed and implemented as a static site tailored for GitHub Pages hosting.
Focused on maintainable structure, accessibility, and performance-first rendering.
Includes reusable section/tile systems and typewriter-based storytelling.

hobby.heading: Templated Mobile Starter
hobby.cover_description: A reusable mobile app starter template for faster product kickoffs.
hobby.description:
Structured template for iOS/Android projects with shared conventions and CI foundations.
Accelerates setup for navigation, API wiring, state management, and release pipelines.
Built to improve delivery consistency across multiple app initiatives.
